methods.getColumnLocation:
:param name: (java.lang.CharSequence) - The column name
:return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.locations.ColumnLocation) The ColumnLocation for the defined column under this table location
methods.getIndex:
:return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.utils.ReadOnlyIndex) The (possibly-empty) index of a table location, or null if index information
 is unknown or does not exist for this table location.
methods.getKey: :return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.locations.ImmutableTableLocationKey) An ImmutableTableLocationKey instance for this location
methods.getLastModifiedTimeMillis:
:return: (long) The last modified time for a table location, in milliseconds from the epoch:
  NULL_TIME: Modification time information is unknown or does not exist for this location
  >= 0: The time this table was last modified, in milliseconds from the UTC epoch
methods.getSize:
:return: (long) The size of a table location:
 NULL_SIZE: Size information is unknown or does not exist for this location
  >= 0: The table location exists and has (possibly empty) data
methods.getStateLock: :return: (java.lang.Object) The Object that accessors should synchronize on if they want to invoke multiple getters with consistent results.
methods.getTableKey: :return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.locations.ImmutableTableKey) An ImmutableTableKey instance for the enclosing table
methods.handleUpdate:
**Incompatible overloads text - text from the first overload:**

See TableLocationState for documentation of values.

*Overload 1*  
  :param index: (io.deephaven.db.v2.utils.ReadOnlyIndex) - The new index. Ownership passes to this location; callers should
                                clone it if necessary.
  :param lastModifiedTimeMillis: (long) - The new lastModificationTimeMillis
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param source: (io.deephaven.db.v2.locations.TableLocationState) - The source to copy state values from

text: Partial TableLocation implementation for use by TableDataService implementations.
